item.title: ChatGPT in Software Development
item.description: Describe the target, let the machine figure it out. The world has changed. I know, there are many similar blog articles stating the obvious: Certain professions will have to re-define themselves. I will just show examples of how ChatGPT is about changing my workflow and improving my life. Infrastructure as Code One workflow to deploy new infrastructure often is to work interactively with the cloud’s provider graphical UI and rewrite it in the IaC suite of your choice.
